title: (Champion suggestion) Tsen- Transcendence of Thunder
body:
Tsen is a champion who uses Thunder and electricity to his advantage. Useful in teamfights as all of his abilities are multi target or are of effect.
HP 577+81 5.5/5sec +0.3
MP 290+65 4.5/5sec +0.41
AD 53+2.1
Atk speed 0.72+ 1%
Armour 21+3
MR 19+3
Speed 340
Ranged, instant( like vel'koz)
Passive: Chain Lightning
Every 12/11/10/9 sec, summons a chain lightning on the next basic attack. Bounces 3/4/5/6 times dealing levelx20 magic damage +50%ap 
Basic attacks reduce CD by 0.75, Spells reduces CD by 1.25sec
Q: Shock wave. 45/50/55/60/65mp 13.25/12.5/11.75/11/10.25sec  Cast range 600.
Sends a bolt of power from the sky after 0.25sec of channeling. Dealing 45/90/135/180/225 +75%ap magic damage on the landing point. If a champion is struck 30/60/90/12/150+50% ap magic damage will be splashed around a 225radius area. If a unit is killed, CD is reduced by 1.5sec.
W: Force pulse 60mp 15.5/15/14.5/14/13.5sec
1 enemy and 3 nearby enemies (prioritises champions) within 950 range will be either pushed or pulled to the 475 range point ( the caster target will be either in a zone less than 475 or more).
After being pushed/pulled to that line, they are stunned for 0.75/1/1.25/1.5/1.75 sec and takes 5/6/7/8/9% +1% for every 80ap max hp as magic damage.
E: Lightning Field 14/16/19/22/25 mp/sec 0.25sec. Circle radius 475.
Creates a field of lightning bolts around Tsen. Dealing 20/35/50/65/80 +10%AP as magic damage to enemies inside. Slowing by 10% and reduces armour/MR by 3 every second to enemies inside up to 30. lasts 3sec after exiting the area, rejoining the zone will refresh the duration.
R: Wrath of the thunder Titan. 100/125/150mp 140/115/90sec
Gains a shield that equals to 20/35/50% max hp and shield strength increases a bonus 10% max hp for each nearby enemy within 750 Radius. They take 125/250/375 +5/7.5/10%max hp +2% every 100 ap. Increasing movement speed by 25 for every 10% bonus. Maximum damage on one champion is 625/925/1325 magic damage +50/75/100max damage every 100ap. Shield lasts untill destroyed of 15sec.
Capable lanes: Top, Jungle, Mid, Support.
Build suggestion AP , CDR and mana regeneration.
Tsen is a champion Highly adept at fighting teamfights, if he is not taken down early, he will dish out a very high amount of magical damage.
Taunt against volibear
"Volibear, ahahaha, you barely use thunder. I AM THUNDER"
Taunt against Olaf
"That Lightning strike will never  kill me.... ahahahah"
Taunt against Xerath
"You are similar to me, Xerath. But i Was, Am and Always WILL be stronger than you, MWAHAHAHAHAHA"
Upon Using W
To enemies pushed to the range
"Get out of my way, weaklings"
"Scatter, inferior life forms"
To enemies pulled to the range
"Come to me, and face your  doom"
"Dont run, I will end your suffering"
Upon Activating E
"this is my reign now, leave, or die."
"I claim this land. MINE"
Upon using R
"I feel... SO MUCH STRONGER"
"The more of you there is, the more powerful i become"
"*Thunder Crackle*"
"In my new form, i am Undefeatable"

replies.body: tbh, he's like a katarina except even more aoe effect... :D
Other than his passive just being a ludens echo, this champion feels pretty solid. Except for the %Hp scaling on is E.
wat..... the only %Hp is on his w or R
